===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|せん}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=せん}} {{m|ltc|箋|tr={{IPAchar|/*d͡zen/}}}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} traditional {{m|zh|箋}} and simplified {{m|zh|笺|tr=jiān}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|せん|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|籖}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|せん}}

# a [[slip]] of [[paper]]
# a [[label]] made of [[wood]], [[bamboo]], [[ivory]], or [[paper]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|箋注|せんちゅう}}, {{ja-r|箋註|せんちゅう}}: an [[annotation]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|処方箋|しょほうせん}}: a [[prescription]]
* {{ja-r|付箋|ふせん}}, {{ja-r|附箋|ふせん}}: a [[tag]], a [[label]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ふだ}}
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ふだ|文|tr1=fumi|t1=writing|板|tr2=ita|t2=board}}, from the way that thin slices of wood were used for labels.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

{{IPAchar|/fumiita/}} > {{IPAchar|/fumita/}} > {{IPAchar|/funda/}} > {{IPAchar|/fuda/}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ふだ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|札}}, {{ja-l|簡}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ふだ}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|sort=ふだ|札|dot=:}} a [[slip]] of [[paper]]; a [[label]]

=====Usage notes=====
The {{lang|ja|箋}} spelling for ''fuda'' is rare. The {{ja-l|札}} spelling is the most common.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
